title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 78.5 - Adjustment; hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 78.5 - Adjustment; hearings

State Regulations

The superintendent may, after notice and opportunity to be heard, determine that the basis used for valuation of the stock of any subsidiary does not, under the specific circumstances of the case, reflect the value of the subsidiary and may order either an adjustment in valuation or the use of one of the other specified bases of valuation. Notes

78.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
